title: Mathematics Learning Reflection Support Program Through Learning Activity Visualization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Computation Skills and Digital Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Establishing a system in smartphone-based mathematics microlearning environments where learners can reflect on and improve their learning processes through visualization tools based on learning analytics data.

learning_goals: Learners can improve the efficiency of their study time allocation by 20% or more through weekly learning pattern visualization.
Learners can identify three or more major error types occurring in the mathematical problem-solving process based on activity log analysis.
Learners can establish specific learning plans for the following week using feedback provided by visualization tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
